description: Try our easy to follow Goat’s Cheese & Roasted Cherry Tomato Crostini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bruschetta & crostini,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Goat’s Cheese & Roasted Cherry Tomato Crostini Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread 150g soft goat’s cheese on to one end of the crostini. Place roasted cherry tomato on to the other end and tuck a mint leaf under the tomato. Season with black pepper to serve. For an alternative recipe that plays on the flavors of an Italian tricolore salad, replace the goat’s cheese with a thin slice of buffalo mozzarella, and garnish with a fresh basil leaf. Top the crostini up to 30 minutes before serving.
